message.linkingbooks.no_intraage_linking: You cannot link within the same Age.
message.linkingbooks.insufficient_experi: You do not have enough experience to link.
linkingbooks.configgui.linkingcost_point: How many experience points it costs to use a linking book. Stacks with levels option.
linkingbooks.configgui.linkingcost_level: How many experience levels it costs to use a linking book. Stacks with points option.
linkingbooks.configgui.panel_chunk_load_: The radius of chunks to load when a linking panel is rendering.
linkingbooks.configgui.panel_chunk_rende: The maximum render distance (in chunks) of a linking panel.
linkingbooks.configgui.use_immersive_por: If Immersive Portals is present, uses it to render Linking Panels.
If Immersive Portals is present, uses it to render Linking Portals.
